topic.title: 주말 소풍 계획하기
topic.description: 이번 주말에 친구와 함께 공원으로 소풍 갈 계획을 세우는 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: A: 이번 주말에 뭐 특별한 계획 있어요
A: 날씨가 아주 좋을 것 같아요. 우리 같이 공원에 소풍 가는 거 어때요?
B: 좋은 생각이에요! 각자 먹을 것을 좀 가져가는 게 어때요?
B: 그럼 저는 과일이랑 음료수를 좀 가져갈게요.
A: 완벽해요! 토요일 오전 11시에 공원 입구에서 만나요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Have you got any special plans for this weekend?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Have you got any special plans | for this weekend?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: The weather is going to be great. How about we go on a picnic to the park together?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: The weather is going to be great. || How about we go on a picnic | to the park together?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: That's a great idea! How about we each bring something to eat?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: That's a great idea! || How about we each bring | something to eat?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Sounds good. I'll make some sandwiches.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Sounds good. || I'll make some sandwiches.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: Then I'll bring some fruit and drinks.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: Then I'll bring | some fruit and drinks.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Perfect! Let's meet at the park entrance at 11 a.m. on Saturday.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Perfect! || Let's meet at the park entrance | at 11 a.m. on Saturday.
